member.name: M:TorontoAPIServer.Controllers.ShareThingsController.Get(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: GET /ShareThings : get user shares, get my share default,if set the userId property, get the share of userId user, with shareIds parameter, will only get the shares which in the shareIds
member.param: page of the results,0 means return all record
